function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Regular updates of quanta generation rate values for different activities and viral load, continuous monitoring of virus characteristics","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Continuous research and data collection, collaboration with global health organizations for data sharing","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting more accurate studies to determine appropriate values for quanta generation rate.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Using accurate quanta generation rate values specific to the activity level and infection type.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increasing ventilation rates to improve air quality and reduce the likelihood of airborne infection.","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encourage use of masks and proper ventilation systems, and limit vocalizing activities during occupancy.","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implementing appropriate ventilation measures, maintaining social distancing rules, and monitoring occupancy levels.","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improve ventilation systems, implement air purifiers, and enforce guidelines for indoor air quality.","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement measures to reduce occupancy density, enhance ventilation, and monitor air quality for early detection of infection risk.","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improving ventilation systems and air circulation in indoor spaces","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continued research and data collection on virus transmission and variants","category":"Early detection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ongoing efforts to standardize and improve infection modeling parameters","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular opening of ventilation openings like windows and doors to allow for air exchange","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase ventilation and air exchange during winter months, implement air purification systems","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improved ventilation, reduced class movement, monitoring of infection trends","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Monitoring and adjustment of ventilation, implementation of additional measures, promotion of mask-wearing","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Maintaining open windows/vents, use of trickle vents, installation of mechanical ventilation","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing higher rates of outdoor air supply and air exchange to reduce the concentration of potentially infectious airborne particles.","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Enhance ventilation systems, monitor co2 levels, engage building services engineer","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Active management of classroom windows and ventilation openings, monitoring co2 levels","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Monitoring and controlling excess co2 levels, and managing occupancy","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Further work on understanding ventilation implications and effects","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Monitoring outdoor air supply, evaluating ventilation provision based on environmental data","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improving ventilation and filtration systems, implementing engineering control measures","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exploring alternative engineering control measures, optimizing existing ventilation systems","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Continued research and monitoring, implementation of flexible and adaptable mitigation strategies","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Install high-efficiency particulate air hepa filters, conduct system modifications, and avoid the use of centralized recirculation","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular maintenance and servicing of air filters, consideration of alternative ventilation systems","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Assess the potential impact of ozone generation in advance, consider alternative air cleaning technologies","category":"Use of smart/innovative air quality controls technology","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conducting airflow pattern analysis to optimize air cleaner/filter placement","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Careful consideration and selection of air cleaner/filter based on effectiveness studies","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Balancing the air supply rate and target area to minimize transport of exhaled pathogens","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Restricting the use of the pv system by infected occupants and implementing additional air filtration or purification methods","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Consideration of airflow patterns and strategic placement of fans to minimize re-suspension, use of air purifiers to capture re-suspended particles","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Regular cleaning and maintenance of fans, use of air purifiers to capture deposited particles","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conduct further studies to understand deposition rates in real-world conditions, and implement effective ventilation and air filtration systems","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Avoid the use of desk fans unless stagnant zones are identified, and ensure proper orientation of fans to increase mixing with the wider space","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Thorough assessment of the effectiveness and potential by-products of air ionization technology before implementation; consideration of alternative air purification methods","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Carefully consider the positioning and number of ventilation inlets and outlets to reduce the risk of infection. evaluate the impact on airflow patterns, air exchange, and environmental monitoring.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Evaluate the impact on environmental monitoring and fire safety. consider the potential implications for smoke detection and fire safety measures.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Proper installation and maintenance of uvgi systems. use of protective measures and regular inspections to ensure safe uvgi operation.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conduct further real-world studies to validate the effectiveness of the method","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ensure systems are installed by trained professionals and follow safety guidelines","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Provide warnings and safety guidelines for occupants, monitor uv-c irradiation levels, use uv lamps with low ozone generation","category":"Use of smart/innovative air quality controls technology","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Further research and testing to gather evidence of effectiveness","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Detailed study to understand the impact of fans on virus transmission","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Detailed bespoke study to understand the impact of screens on air circulation and fire safety","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ensure adequate outdoor air supply rates and consider additional risk reduction measures","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Improving ventilation systems, wearing masks, and practicing social distancing","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implementation of air filtration systems, use of portable air purifiers, and proper ventilation design","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
